text: Ruzuku uses cookies to help Ruzuku identify and track visitors, their usage of Ruzuku website, and their website access preferences.
For example, we ask visitors who sign up for a course hosted on ruzuku.com to provide a username and email address.
Ruzuku only discloses logged in user IP addresses under the same circumstances that it uses and discloses personally-identifying information as described below.

In each case, Ruzuku collects such information only insofar as is necessary or appropriate to fulfill the purpose of the visitor's interaction with Ruzuku.
Those who engage in transactions with Ruzuku -- by purchasing access to the ruzuku.com service, for example -- are asked to provide additional information, including as necessary the personal and financial information required to process those transactions.
